body:
There are a lot of people on YouTube that make music for a living, and a lot of these people are really fantastic!! My favorites would definitely The Piano Guys and Lindsay Sterling, However the Runner-Up would be Pentatonix.

Opinions?!?

title: What is your favorite YouTube music group?

rileguy, we have very similar tastes in music. :)

Besides classical, I really enjoy Tobu, Monstercat, and some other Dubstep creators.
